表单验证插件

插件demo如下：

demo代码如下：

	        JS代码
			
				//表单验证
				$scope.submit = function(){
					GM.LayoutOper.validateForm($validation,$scope.userForm,function(){
						GM.Infomation.show("验证通过！");
					},function(){
						GM.Infomation.show("请完善表单！");
					});
				};

	        
			Html代码
			
				<form class="form-horizontal form-simple" name="userForm">
					<table class="table table-fixed">
						<tr>
							<td colspan="4" class="td-label">
								<label>姓名</label>
							</td>
							<td colspan="8" class="td-value">
								<input type="text" name="name" ng-model="formData.name" validator="required">
							</td>
						</tr>
						<tr>
							<td colspan="4" class="td-label">
								<label>年龄</label>
							</td>
							<td colspan="8" class="td-value">
								<input type="text" name="age" ng-model="formData.age" validator="number">
							</td>
						</tr>
					</table>
				</form>
				<button class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="submit()">提交</button>
